Abdullah Hill Nakib

Dhaka, Bangladesh · +8801908915577 · therealnakib@gmail.com

I’m Nakib from Bangladesh, a Textile Engineering graduate who is passionate about Web 3.0 and crypto. I have over 2 years of experience using crypto, CEX, DEX, NFTs, and multiple blockchains, and I actively promote projects on X while helping build communities. I am still learning how blockchain works behind the scenes, often using AI to assist me since I don’t know how to code. I enjoy reading about technology, innovation, and human thinking, and I always seek opportunities to grow in the Web 3.0 space. My goal is to join a motivated team and use my skills to create something meaningful that can change the world.
